page.title: 14CHURCHES AROUND HAYES
page.content: Hayes Primary surveyed their local churches. The Church of England has the oldest building, 835 years, and is dedicated to St Mary. Our Lady of the Rosary, the R.C. Church, is only 30 years old, while the Church of God is 47 years old. St Mary's has a Sunday School, Youth Club, Scouts, Cubs, Beavers, Brownies, Guides, Boys and Girls Brigades. The Rosary Church has a catechism class on Saturday mornings while the Church of God runs a Sunday School, Boys Clubs, Girls Clubs and a summer camp. On one Sunday 280 attended mass, 435 came to St Mary's, while about 30-35 attend the Church of God each Sunday morning and evening. A rector leads the Parish Church, the Rosary Church has a priest while the Church of God has elders.
